sentences: Kruglik's one act opera The Carriage was one of three new operas selected by the Mariinsky Theatre for performance in the summer 2009 festival, receiving its premiere at the opera house on 21 June of that year.
Version 1.0 (composed with Svetlana Nesterova), was a prize-winner at the 2008 composition competition at the Bolshoi Theatre.
Kruglick's compositions have also been performed at the Ko≈°ice Music Spring Festival and the Youth Academies of Russia and Arena.
